Lead.smsT2:
Hey {contactname}, how will you spend {valuation} PKR? Sell your car and get money in your account in 3 quick and easy steps.
Visit www.vava.cars/pk  or call us on 0304-1110065
Lead.smsT3: Hey {contactname}, your online valuation is valid until today only. Book your appointment on www.vava.cars/pk and visit our inspection centre. Get Free Valuation, inspection and Secure Payment
Lead.smsT4: Still haven't sold your car? Get a valuation for your car on www.vava.cars/pk. Avoid long negotiation, risks and sell your car in 3 easy steps.
Lead.smsT5:
Hi {contactname}, Get a new valuation for your {make}. Avoid long negotiation, risks and sell your car in 3 easy steps.
Get initial valuation on www.vava.cars/pk
Lead.smsT6: Are you fed up trying to sell your car? Visit us and relax with free tea/coffee and wifi in one of our centres, update your valuation now on www.vava.cars/pk

Opportunity.smsT1:
Randevunu kaçırdın! Yeni bir randevuyla ödemeniz anında hesabınızda!
SMS almak istemiyorsanız 'RED VAVA' yazıp 3607'ye iletebilirsiniz. Mersis:0924079386900001
Opportunity.smsT2:
Still want cash for your car? You could have cashed your car 4 days ago and turned it into an investment.
You still can. We are waiting for you at our purchase centres. In collaboration with VavaCars PSO. To book an appointmenet visit www.vava.cars/pk or call us on 0304-1110065
Opportunity.smsT3: Get a new valuation for your car. Remove the risk and hassle of selling your car privately with one of our quick, transparent appointments https://www.vava.cars/pk/value-my-car
Opportunity.smsT4:
Aracını satmayı denemekten bunaldın mı? Rahat ve konforlu araç alım merkezimizden birini seçin: Randevunuzu alıp aracınınızı ekspertize getirin, ücretsiz kahve ve kablosuz internetin keyfini çıkarın.
SMS almak istemiyorsanız 'RED VAVA' yazıp 3607'ye iletebilirsiniz. Mersis:0924079386900001
Opportunity.smsT5:
We will be ready and waiting to help you sell your car tomorrow. This is a reminder for your appointment tomorrow {appointmentDate} at {appointmentTime} at {centeraddress}. To update your appointment call on 0304-1110065 or send an email on infopakistan@vava.cars.
Location: https://goo.gl/maps/hxE7FSnLeXDVUrvL8

Prospect.smsT2: Have you been able to think about the final price offered to you? If you accept our offer, you can immediately sell your car to VavaCars.
Prospect.smsT4: We hope to see you again. We don't want you to waste any more time selling your car. Sell your car instantly and feel at ease.
Prospect.smsT5: Last day for your offer is coming up! Sell your car to VavaCars today and instantly see money in your account. Offer is valid for 2 more days!
Prospect.smsT6:
7 days have passed since our last meeting... If you still haven't sold your car, we can give you a new appointment.
All you have to do is inform us. Visit www.vava.cars/pk
Prospect.smsT8: Is your mileage getting too high? We hope you have sold your car, if you haven't, we are here to help you!
Prospect.smsT9: Did you get a better offer? If you still don't have a better offer, don't waste any more time. VavaCars is always with you.
Prospect.smsT10:
45 days passed over the last given price. We would like to provide you with the best service and save you from this hassle. You can always reach us with a click whenever you need us.
VavaCars
